title: Rengar is still disgustingly over power{{champion:107}}
body:
even after the new pie nerve of Rengar{{champion:107}} 's passive, he is still an over power Champion.
1, his W give him heal and also remove crowd control and deal damage as well. not even one Champion in League can do that not even {{champion:41}}  or {{champion:122}} . this might be one of his unique ability, all right.... but also he got other ability other cham don't have. and can't fight with 
2, he got that increase move speed ult with more like another ghost. this might not sounds that OP, but if u combine with all his other abilities people will have problem to dealing with him. Plus he can even see other's in the same time 
3, he got that AOE damage Q, deals crazy amount of damage and also early JG clearance ability. This is problem with this cham, he can clearance early, he can Gank early, he have Crowd control and snow ball hard with his passive.

if we put all his ability together. 
{{champion:107}} is a champion who have {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:6}} gap closer, crowd control, self heal and aoe damage champion, this is not even include his wreak version of {{champion:56}} 's ult. and a guaranteed Critical strike 
there is not even one cham in league of legend have so many ability at the same place and this is not even include his sumner spell.

lee counters

Lee don't counter him, lee can run away from him. and lee can almost run away from any one if he don't want to fight .
i m talking about some one can actually fight him

Lee can easily press R, and considering the vast amount of items lee can buy that grant a tonne of ad and a tonne of defensive stats he leaves rengar at about 1/4-3/4 hp without taking too much damage, which can then be followed by a q, e a few aa weaved in there and hydra if needed. 

Janna also counters him really well. A yasuo will win if he has nado up and knows how to aim. Gragas eats him. Sion can spam laugh emote as rengar does nothing. Hecarim really takes it the whole way, mashing rengar to a pulp before taking a dump on his mangled corpse. Literally anything with a knockup or knockback can destroy a rengar, he needs to land his jump in a fight or he is useless for 4 sec.

Try the NA boards, you're more likely to get a response from the developers.

And yes, he's powerful.
He is getting hotfixed. Happy now?
i heard he only got nerf on his passive. but what make him hard to deal with or counter play is his ability
